definitions: a form of sexual behavior in which gratification is linked to an abnormal degree to a particular object, activity, part of the body, etc.
shortDefinitions: form of sexual behaviour in which gratification is linked to abnormal degree to particular object etc.

definitions: excessive and irrational devotion or commitment to a particular thing

examples.text: a critique of the new technological fetishism

shortDefinitions: excessive and irrational devotion or commitment

definitions: worship of an inanimate object for its supposed magical powers or because it is considered to be inhabited by a spirit
shortDefinitions: worship of inanimate object for its supposed magical powers
